title: Chapter 340 - Ten Thousand Swords Resonate, Like Ministers Before A Holy Monarch
body:
Chapter 340 - Ten Thousand Swords Resonate, Like Ministers Before A Holy Monarch

I don’t know if Su Yi can stop this slash! Mu Xi, Pu Yi, and the others felt as if their hearts were on the verge of jumping out of their chests.

Clang!

As Su Hongli slashed, Su Yi stretched out his hand, and the Abstruse God Sword appeared in his palm. The blade was dark and serene as ink, and it produced a low, majestic hum.

His expression was calm as he casually swung his sword.

Whoosh!

A river of clear sword qi took to the skies, vast and imposing, with grand momentum.

It was as if he’d pulled a galaxy into the human world. However, unlike before, the clear Dao Light formed of the Five Spiritual Aggregates was beckoning it. Its power was starkly different from before!

Boom!

The startling red sword qi blazed like demonic flames as it flew through the air and clashed with Su Yi’s transparent galaxy.

Instantly, an explosive, immeasurable current of destructive energy burst apart in midair. Sword qi scattered like a rain of light. Blood-red and clear lights clashed, beautiful yet terrifying.

The surrounding area had long since been reduced to rubble, but as this new current of destructive power swept forth, startling, eye-catching chasms formed on the ground, one after another....
original_title: Chapter 340 - Ten Thousand Swords Resonate, Like Ministers Before a Holy Monarch
